uvi.description:
usb: fix various gadget panics on 10gbps cabling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.126 by commit 5ef23506695b01d5d56a13a092a97f2478069d75. For more details please see the references link.
